articles.content: The T20 World Cup is three months away, and for India it is an opportunity to bury the ghosts of last year's World Cup and start afresh. A lot would have changed between now and then Rohit Sharma has… [+2095 chars]

articles.title: Kasper Schmeichel joins Nice to end 11-year Leicester spell - ESPN India
articles.description: Kasper Schmeichel has completed a move to French club Nice to end his 11-year stay at Leicester City.
articles.content:

articles.author: Nate Saunders
articles.title: Daniel Ricciardo deserves better than being pawn in McLaren's pursuit of Oscar Piastri - ESPN India
articles.description: McLaren appears to be trying to force Daniel Ricciardo out for Oscar Piastri, but it is far from certain the Formula 2 champion would be an upgrade on his Australian counterpart.
articles.content: The remarkable events of Tuesday around Alpine junior Oscar Piastri -- which have been labelled Oscargate and the Piasco online -- appeared to confirm McLaren is intent on replacing one Australian in… [+7718 chars]
